name: Dissent Labs Genuflex Compression Full Protect Ski Socks - Unisex
categories: Genuflex Compression Full Protect Ski Socks
description: Highly breathable compression socks for performance, warmth and comfort over long days in your boots. Strategic cushioning provides luxurious comfort with a minimal increase in the sock's thickness. TRUE-Compression system provides an outstanding fit for the long haul and reduced foot numbness.Fabric is a combination of nylon and LYCRA® for breathability, warmth and a nuanced fit.3-dimensional padding provides comfort and fills in rigid performance-fit boots.20-30mmHG graduated compression increases warmth, minimizes blisters, while reducing foot numbness.Small fits Euro size 36-39; Medium fits 40-43; Large fits 44-47; XL fits 48 and up.
